author: mightypenguin
content: Is there a comparison of L2 vs Eth2 Shard? Seems like there's a good number of similarities.

author: jadler2664
content:
> Optimistic rollups have bigger and/or more blocks than L1
Where did you hear that? This is absolutely not a requirement for an optimistic rollup. See this talk from the creator of optimistic rollups: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l4jccXoqLGM

author: jadler2664
content:
> Each rollup can go much further than any L1 can securely
This is incorrect. See https://twitter.com/_prestwich/status/1288200682340679680
